text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>
  Die 
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Mangoldische Bibel</TITLE>
    <YEAR>1729</YEAR>
  </BIBL>.
  Die 
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Jelische Lexicon</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME>
  </BIBL>,
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Stettlers</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Schweitzer-Chronick</TITLE>
  </BIBL>,
  das <TITLE>Reich der Todten</TITLE>,
  samt noch einigen anderen neuen frantzösisch historischen Büchern,
  davon der <TITLE>Catalogus</TITLE> bey Herrn M. Daniel Meyer im Collegio zu sehen ist,
  als welcher diese Bücher zu verkauffen in Commission hat.
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":7,"explanation":"1) Added closing </BIBL> tag after the first bibliographic block. 2) Added a separate <BIBL> wrapper for the third work (author Stettlers) so that each title stands in its own bibliographic unit. 3) Inserted a comma outside XML tags to maintain punctuation integrity. 4) Converted the corrupted Unicode sequences (frantz√¬∂sisch, B√Â¬cheren, Commi-√Â¬cion) into their correct German spellings (frantzösisch, Büchern, Commission). 5) Added a <TITLE>Catalogus</TITLE> tag around the word “Catalogus” for consistency with the other titled items. 6) Normalised spacing and hyphenation (Schweitzer-Chronick, removal of stray hyphen before Commission). 7) Reformatted the XML with line-breaks and indentation for readability. These changes yield a well-formed, valid XML fragment."}

parsed.fixed_xml:
<ITEM>
  Die 
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Mangoldische Bibel</TITLE>
    <YEAR>1729</YEAR>
  </BIBL>.
  Die 
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Jelische Lexicon</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME>
  </BIBL>,
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Stettlers</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Schweitzer-Chronick</TITLE>
  </BIBL>,
  das <TITLE>Reich der Todten</TITLE>,
  samt noch einigen anderen neuen frantzösisch historischen Büchern,
  davon der <TITLE>Catalogus</TITLE> bey Herrn M. Daniel Meyer im Collegio zu sehen ist,
  als welcher diese Bücher zu verkauffen in Commission hat.
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation: 1) Added closing </BIBL> tag after the first bibliographic block. 2) Added a separate <BIBL> wrapper for the third work (author Stettlers) so that each title stands in its own bibliographic unit. 3) Inserted a comma outside XML tags to maintain punctuation integrity. 4) Converted the corrupted Unicode sequences (frantz√¬∂sisch, B√Â¬cheren, Commi-√Â¬cion) into their correct German spellings (frantzösisch, Büchern, Commission). 5) Added a <TITLE>Catalogus</TITLE> tag around the word “Catalogus” for consistency with the other titled items. 6) Normalised spacing and hyphenation (Schweitzer-Chronick, removal of stray hyphen before Commission). 7) Reformatted the XML with line-breaks and indentation for readability. These changes yield a well-formed, valid XML fragment.
